desc: Developing solution in stages. This piece of work covers a single stage.Stage 1.  Basic function of Android App creation and small piece of code to run on a Rasberry Pi (Raspbian OS).  All code needs to be modular and distinguishable.An Android App (APK) written in Java that has modular block of code doing the following functions:1.	Bluetooth enablement.2.	Length of Time input (in minutes)3.	Send ButtonA Raspbian OS piece of code:1.	Receive via Bluetooth Length of Time data from App.2.	Code for a Clock that starts on receipt of Length of Time (LoT) data.a.	Concurrently sends a signal to GPIO (5v high)3.	Sends notification (Print to screen” of “Start”4.	Compares Raspbian clock with LoT and sends a signal to GPIO (5v High)5.	Send notification to (Print to screen) “End”6.	Create TransactionID  (Label and Date).
title: Android_App-Pi _Sw
